channel.title: Nmap on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Nmap on TLDRBins

item.title: LDAP
item.description: Enum ldapsearch ldapdomaindump nmap # Get domain base ldapsearch -x -H ldap://<TARGET> -s base namingcontexts # Get all from domain ldapsearch -x -H ldap://<TARGET> -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' # Just get a class (e.g. person) ldapsearch -x -H ldap://<TARGET> -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' '(objectClass=person)' # With creds ldapsearch -x -H ldap://<TARGET> -D "CN=<USER>,CN=Users,DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>" -w '<PASSWORD>' -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' # Fix 'BindSimple: Transport encryption required.' LDAPTLS_REQCERT=never ldapsearch -x -H ldaps://<TARGET> -D "CN=<USER>,CN=Users,DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>" -w '<PASSWORD>' -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' # With creds ldapdomaindump -u '<DOMAIN>\<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' <TARGET> -o .

item.title: Nmap
item.description: Host Discovery Ping Scan nmap -sn <TARGET> $ nmap -sn 192.168.100.1 Starting Nmap 7.95 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2025-07-17 11:25 UTC Nmap scan report for 192.168.100.1 Host is up (0.41s latency). Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 1.35 seconds Scan Techniques (Bypass Network Filtering) TCP SYN to Listed Ports nmap -sn -PS<PORT_LIST> <TARGET> $ nmap -sn -PS53,80,443 192.168.100.1 Starting Nmap 7.95 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2025-07-17 11:25 UTC Nmap scan report for 192.

item.title: SMB Enum
item.description: SMB Share Enum nmap sudo nmap --script=smb-enum-shares -p 445 <TARGET> $ sudo nmap --script=smb-enum-shares -p 445 10.10.11.207 Starting Nmap 7.94SVN ( https://nmap.org ) at 2024-09-25 04:53 GMT Nmap scan report for 10.10.11.207 Host is up (0.26s latency). PORT STATE SERVICE 445/tcp open microsoft-ds Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 7.96 seconds Anonymous Login smbmap smbclient impacket smbmap -H <TARGET> --no-banner smbmap -H <TARGET> -u null --no-banner # List known share smbmap -H <TARGET> -r <SHARE> smbclient -N -L \\\\<TARGET>\\ $ smbclient -N -L \\\\10.

item.title: SMTP
item.description: Simple Mail Debugging Server #!/usr/bin/env python3 import aiosmtpd.controller class CustomSMTPHandler: async def handle_DATA(self, server, session, envelope): print(f"[+] Received a mail.") print("=" * 50) print(envelope.content.decode()) print("=" * 50) return "250 OK" handler = CustomSMTPHandler() server = aiosmtpd.controller.Controller(handler, hostname="0.0.0.0", port=25) server.start() print("[*] Listening on 0.0.0.0:25") input("[*] Server started. Press Return to quit.\n") server.stop() Users Enum nmap script smtp-user-enum nmap -p 25 --script=smtp-enum-users <TARGET> # Use RCPT smtp-user-enum -M RCPT -U /usr/share/seclists/Usernames/cirt-default-usernames.txt -t <TARGET> # Use VRFY smtp-user-enum -M VRFY -U /usr/share/seclists/Usernames/cirt-default-usernames.
